text: Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavir bizir kamɨn itim, a nɨn navimɨn ikɨ. God nɨn nɨghnɨzim gɨfo, eghtɨ nɨ gumazir igharazitamɨn mɨkɨman markɨ. Guizbangɨra, gumazitam bizitam gɨnɨghnɨzima, bizir kam dera, ezɨ an navim osemezir puvatɨ, gumazir kam bar akongegham.(14:22) Grighɨn akam vezɨn kamɨn deragha bigha mɨkemezir puvatɨ.
